description: The entire UI development plan relies on a single Senior Frontend Developer, creating a critical single point of failure and a project bottleneck.
mitigation_strategy: Hire a second, mid-level frontend developer or secure a dedicated contractor for the project duration.
contingency_plan: Initiate cross-training for a backend developer in basic React/MUI tasks to offload low-complexity UI work.
monitoring_trigger: Any slippage > 3 days on a critical path frontend task.

description: Incomplete implementation of the Jint sandbox could lead to a severe security vulnerability (DoS, RCE).
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory security code reviews on the Jint wrapper service. Run the service in a container with strict resource limits as a second layer of defense.
contingency_plan: Disable the feature via the system-wide feature flag (TASK-029) and prepare an emergency hotfix plan.
monitoring_trigger: Security scanning tools flag a vulnerability in the Jint wrapper.

description: Failure to ensure transactional integrity between business operations and audit log creation could lead to an incomplete audit trail, failing compliance.
mitigation_strategy: Implement a transactional outbox pattern or ensure domain events for auditing are dispatched only after the primary transaction successfully completes.
contingency_plan: Develop a reconciliation script to scan primary data and audit logs to identify discrepancies for manual review.
monitoring_trigger: Integration test failure for transactional auditing.
